title: Fortnite with touch controls now available to all iPhone and Android players on NVIDIA GeForce Now
content:
The losers in Epic Games massive spat with Apple (and to a lesser extent, Google) were always the Fortnite players. But where there’s a will, there’s a way, and iPhone players especially can rejoice: Fortnite is back as a proper mobile game with touch controls. All thanks to a collaboration between Epic Games and NVIDIA

The post Fortnite with touch controls now available to all iPhone and Android players on NVIDIA GeForce Now appeared first on XDA.
description: After a beta period to perfect things, Fortnite with touch controls is now available to all GeForce Now players. Where we dropping?
